import React from "react"; import { Nav, NavDropdown } from "react-bootstrap"; import { LinkContainer } from "react-router-bootstrap"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { logout } from "../../Redux/Action/AuthAction"; const Header = () => { const userLogin = useSelector((state) => state.userLogin); const { userResult } = userLogin; const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart); // console.log(cart); //fun for decimal const addDecimal = (num) => { return (Math.round(num * 100) / 100).toFixed(2); }; cart.itemsPrice = addDecimal( cart.cartItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.qty, 0) ); cart.shippingPrice = addDecimal(cart.cartItems < 500 ? 0 : 50); cart.taxPrice = addDecimal(Number((0.15 * cart.itemsPrice).toFixed(2))); cart.totalPrice = ( Number(cart.itemsPrice) + Number(cart.shippingPrice) + Number(cart.taxPrice) ).toFixed(2); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const logoutHandler = () => { dispatch(logout()); }; return (
{/* Page Preloder */}
{/* Header Section Begin */}
  • herbalproducts@gmail.com
  • Welcome To Herbal Products
{userResult ? ( Profile Logout ) : (   Login )}

Herbal Products

  • Home
  • Products
  • Cart
  • Contact
  • {cart.cartItems.length}
item: {cart.totalPrice}
); }; export default Header;
